patent:
In 2003, pKH- parameter of organic compound was proposed and the pKH- values of more than 2000 organic compounds in acetonitrile have been successfully measured till now (Chem. Eur. J. 2003, 9, 871).
In 2013, the principle error of Marcus theory on electron transfer was discovered, that is, Marcus theory on electron transfer directly violates the law of conservation of energy (JPOC, 2013, 26, 271).
In 2013, a new kinetic equation of chemical reaction (Eq 3) was established to predict activation free energy of chemical reaction (Eq 1) based on only one characteristic parameter of each reactant (OBC, 2013, 11, 6071).
In 2016, the principle error of the traditional theories on kinetic isotope effect (KIE) was discovered (that is, the potential energy surfaces of the H and D transfer reactions are the same), and a new KIE theory was established. The new KIE theory can not only explain all KIE experimental findings, but also quantitatively predict KIE values of various chemical reactions (JPCA 2016, 120, 1779).

project: Prof. Wei Li has made a number of major scientific research achievements in the field of new-type nano-catalysts. Some of these achievements are directly oriented to the national economy, and many achievements have completed the scale-up production on an industrial scale. A number of important research results focusing on the ‘Nano-catalyst Design and Application in Important Chemical Reactions Project’ have achieved scale-up production on an industrial scale. They have been applied to the production of 10,000 tons of PVC by Sichuan Yibin Tianyuan Company and annual output of 5,000 tons of N,N-dimethylaniline by Jiangsu Hongze Dayang Chemical Company through the gas-phase green synthesis process. The accumulated new output value is more than 5 billion yuan, and the profits and taxes are more than 1 billion yuan. While achieving huge economic benefits, they overcome the problems of long production cycle and heavy pollution in industrial applications. These research results have made great contributions to the sustainable development of enterprises' economy and environmental governance.

name: 杨景翔
abstracts: My research interests focus on the interactions between agrochemicals crystals and target organisms, involving the crystal engineering of agrochemicals, crystallization of agrochemicals in complex environments, mass transfer between crystal and organism interface, and the relationship between solid-state chemistry and solution chemistry. By improving understanding of the interface between crystallography and biology, we aim to develop advanced formulations of crystalline pesticides to provide more efficient protection for plants while minimizing environmental impact.

name: 邹小毛
abstracts: 承担过多项国家重大科技攻关项目、973基础项目、国家自然科学基金项目、天津市自然科学基金项目，天津市攻关计划项目。主要致力于高效、低毒、低残留的绿色新农药的创制研究工作和对我国农药工业具有重要影响的重要品种生产工艺的绿色化、清洁化、低成本化的研究。获得过天津市自然科学基金二等奖及教育部自然科学基金三等奖。在生物合理设计方面积累了丰富的经验，并取得了可喜的成果。作为主要创制人员，已经成功创制出一个具有自主知识产权的农药新品种—-新型水旱两用除草剂H-9201，并取得了新农药的临时登记证，目前正在大面积推广使用。从它的设计发现就开始参加研究，尤其在后期全面负责该创制除草剂的研究与开发及产业化工作，已经完成了新农药创制的全过程，在新农药创制工作方面积累了丰富的知识和经验；在重要农药品种的生产工艺绿色化、清洁化及低成本化方面，成功改造了高毒农药替代品种地亚农及烟碱类系列杀虫剂的生产工艺，并建立了生产示范装置，为提升我国农药工业整体制造水平起到重要的推动作用。
directions:
高效绿色新农药的创制及产业化研究
提高重要的精细化工产品（农药或医药）的生产制造技术
设计合理的实验室合成路线，将实验室技术转化为工业化技术研究
